newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Citibank expands in Hungary countryside.
newsitem.headline: Citibank expands in Hungary countryside.

text.p: Citibank Rt, wholly-owned unit of Citibank Overseas Investment Corp, said on Wednesday it was planning further expansion in Hungary.
"Citibank Rt's expansion plans include the establishment of a leasing company and corporate banking service centres outside Budapest," it said in a statement.

The bank changed its name to Citibank Rt from Citibank Budapest Rt, "which fits with our countrywide expansion plans," Richard D. Jackson, chairman and CEO of Citibank in Hungary, said in the statement.
In 1996 the bank posted net income of 3.765 billion forints, compared to 3.788 billion forints in 1995.
